name: grunt-react-templates
description: Grunt task for react-templates - Light weight templates for react -> write html get valid react code

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm version major -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags

author: Ido Keren
